3 namespace Ubiquity\controllers\traits;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UString;
6 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UFileSystem;
7 use Ubiquity\utils\http\foundation\PhpHttp;
8 use Ubiquity\utils\http\foundation\AbstractHttp;
9 use Ubiquity\utils\http\session\PhpSession;
10 use Ubiquity\utils\http\session\AbstractSession;
11 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UArray;
12 use Ubiquity\utils\base\CodeUtils;
13 
22 class StartupConfigTrait {
23  protected static $config;
24  protected static $ctrlNS;
25  protected static $httpInstance;
26  protected static $sessionInstance;
27 
28  public static function getConfig() {
29  return self::$config;
30  }
31 
32  public static function setConfig($config) {
33  self::$config = $config;
34  }
35 
36  public static function getModelsDir() {
37  return self::$config ['mvcNS'] ['models'];
38  }
39 
40  public static function getModelsCompletePath() {
41  return \ROOT . \DS . self::getModelsDir ();
42  }
43 
44  protected static function needsKeyInConfigArray(&$result, $array, $needs) {
45  foreach ( $needs as $need ) {
46  if (! isset ( $array [$need] ) || UString::isNull ( $array [$need] )) {
47  $result [] = $need;
48  }
49  }
50  }
51 
52  public static function getNS($part = 'controllers') {
53  $config = self::$config;
54  $ns = $config ['mvcNS'] [$part];
55  if ($ns !== "" && $ns !== null) {
56  $ns .= "\\";
57  }
58  return $ns;
59  }
60 
61  protected static function setCtrlNS() {
62  self::$ctrlNS = self::getNS ();
63  }
64 
65  public static function checkDbConfig() {
66  $config = self::$config;
67  $result = [ ];
68  $needs = [ 'type','dbName','serverName' ];
69  if (! isset ( $config ['database'] )) {
70  $result [] = 'database';
71  } else {
72  self::needsKeyInConfigArray ( $result, $config ['database'], $needs );
73  }
74  return $result;
75  }
76 
77  public static function checkModelsConfig() {
78  $config = self::$config;
79  $result = [ ];
80  if (! isset ( $config ['mvcNS'] )) {
81  $result [] = "mvcNS";
82  } else {
83  self::needsKeyInConfigArray ( $result, $config ['mvcNS'], [ 'models' ] );
84  }
85  return $result;
86  }
87 
88  public static function reloadConfig() {
89  $appDir = \dirname ( \ROOT );
90  $filename = $appDir . "/app/config/config.php";
91  self::$config = include ($filename);
92  self::startTemplateEngine ( self::$config );
93  return self::$config;
94  }
95 
96  public static function reloadServices() {
97  $config = self::$config; // used in services.php
98  include \ROOT . 'config/services.php';
99  }
100 
101  public static function saveConfig(array $contentArray) {
102  $appDir = \dirname ( \ROOT );
103  $filename = $appDir . "/app/config/config.php";
104  $oldFilename = $appDir . "/app/config/config.old.php";
105  $content = "<?php\nreturn " . UArray::asPhpArray ( $contentArray, "array", 1, true ) . ";";
106  if (CodeUtils::isValidCode ( $content )) {
107  if (! file_exists ( $filename ) || copy ( $filename, $oldFilename )) {
108  return UFileSystem::save ( $filename, $content );
109  }
110  } else {
111  throw new \RuntimeException ( 'Config contains invalid code' );
112  }
113  return false;
114  }
115 
116  public static function updateConfig(array $content) {
117  foreach ( $content as $k => $v ) {
118  self::$config [$k] = $v;
119  }
120  return self::saveConfig ( self::$config );
121  }
122 
123  public static function getHttpInstance() {
124  if (! isset ( self::$httpInstance )) {
125  self::$httpInstance = new PhpHttp ();
126  }
127  return self::$httpInstance;
128  }
129 
130  public static function setHttpInstance(AbstractHttp $httpInstance) {
131  self::$httpInstance = $httpInstance;
132  }
133 
134  public static function getSessionInstance() {
135  if (! isset ( self::$sessionInstance )) {
136  self::$sessionInstance = new PhpSession ();
137  }
138  return self::$sessionInstance;
139  }
140 
141  public static function setSessionInstance(AbstractSession $sessionInstance) {
142  self::$sessionInstance = $sessionInstance;
143  }
144 }
